dict.acceptation: 疲倦的；困倦的；对…不耐烦的；陈旧的；
（使）疲劳（ tire的过去式和过去分词）；对（做）某事感到厌倦；

sent.orig: They are forced hand became tired change the hand, the hand became tired change hand again.
sent.trans: 他们只好左手累了换右手，右手累了又换左手。

sent.orig: He came back home from work a pair of tired eyes and a tired heart.
sent.trans: 他带着一双疲惫的眼神和一颗疲惫的心下班回家。

sent.orig: My weariness, really very tired very tired.
sent.trans: 我疲倦了，真的好累好累。

sent.orig: If you are tired of London, you are tired of life.
sent.trans: （英国谚语）如果你厌倦了伦敦，也就厌倦了生活。

sent.orig: Are you tired? ' ｀Yes. I am a bit (tired) .
sent.trans: 你累了吗？``是的。我有点儿（累）。
